text: Teera n’atwala Ibulaamu mutabani we Lutti muzzukulu we mutabani wa Kalani, ne Salaayi muka mutabani we Ibulaamu, ne bagenda bonna okuva mu Uli eky’Abakaludaaya okugenda mu nsi ya Kalani; bwe baatuuka mu Kalani,11:31 Kalani kibuga ekisangibwa mu Mesopotamiya, era ky’ekifo ekikulu awasinzibwa omwezi, ng’ekibuga ky’e Uli bwe kiri. ne babeera omwo.
